channel.title: LCallDR
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from LCallDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: NY Times/Siena Poll: 44 Percent Say Harris 'Too Liberal'
item.description: A new poll found that more voters see Kamala Harris as "too liberal or progressive" on policy than see Donald Trump as "too conservative."

item.description: Democrats face several obstacles in helping President Biden appoint more federal judges than former President Trump did during his term.
